dialogs.text: This is Charon Station. It is a government space station and as such its purpose is classified. There are rumors though, as is usual.
The Charon rumor is about top-secret biological research and unethical experiments. The station stopped responding a few weeks ago.
My name is John Dexter, I am an investigative reporter from the Proxima Centauri system.
My daughter works as a researcher here on Charon station. I donâ€™t know what exactly she works on, she could not share it even with her closest family.
I found out Charon stopped responding after she missed your family calls twice.
Years of journalist practice teached me to know when something is off.
I have managed to get a ride on a supply shuttle that was sent to the station. The shuttle is about to dock.
When exiting the shuttle I notice an alarm lights flashing all over the docking bay. The station is obviously in lockdown.
Why was the supply shuttle even able to dock here? That is a question for later. I have to find out what happened here, and find my girl if possible.
